attributes.action: re-build the diving boards on the plymouth hoe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please sighn if you would like the plymouth hoe diving boards re-built.

the plymouth diving boards have brought so much fun and joy to so many people and generations theyv'e been thier since the 1960's and are used a lot in the summer still so please sighn if you would like to see them re-built and in good shape again.
